name: py-pygit2

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Pygit2 is a set of Python bindings to the libgit2 shared library,
libgit2 implements the core of Git.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: libgit2
dependencies.description:
libgit2 is a portable, pure C implementation of the Git core methods
provided as a re-entrant linkable library with a solid API, allowing you
to write native speed custom Git applications in any language which
supports C bindings.

dependencies.name: py-cffi
dependencies.description: Foreign Function Interface for Python calling C code

dependencies.name: py-cached-property
dependencies.description: A decorator for caching properties in classes.

dependent_to.name: py-dvc
dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.
